abilities.name: Strong Legs Charge
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Fighting Energy cards from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Zapper Kick
attacks.effect: You may discard all Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
